1003780.name: SYNTHETIK: Arena Premium Upgrade
1003780.description:
The Upgrade grants the following benefits:


For SYNTHETIK: Arena players:

Unlocks the Hard Modes for all arenas, bringing on the real challenge with increased difficulty, more and different enemy constellations, and higher intensity!

Grants an additional Category 5 weapon choice for each class!

Get double the amount of daily 2x Experience tokens for faster class levelling!



For SYNTHETIK: Legion Rising owners:

Purchasing the Arena upgrade enables the Arena mode within the Synthetik: Legion rising client
and enables all new Arena weapons for the Legion Rising campaign:

Unlocks droppable weapons:

- Scrap Cannon
- Laser Cannon
- STG 44
- A5C Laser
- M14 EBR Custom
- M16A3

(Fmg9, Lever Action, M16 Last Ditch, M14 Mini
can also be found in the mystery boost in the Prestige shop)
